title: Roasted aubergine, red pepper and feta pasta salad
ingredients: ['2 medium aubergines', '1 or 2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large avocado', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '300g pasta twists or spirals (such as fusilli or rotini)', '1 red pepper, seeded and diced', '50g marinated feta or plain feta, diced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
